channel.title: Please reply!
channel.description: [glow=red,2,300][/glow] i keep having trouble... my server is all set but i try to log on and it says connection lost and i cant get on. On a different subject... i need to know how to do ::bomb and where to put the code can any1 help me? Also id like to ask people how to switch the starting cords? please help! i know this is alot to ask..... :o

item.title: Please reply!
item.dc:creator: @spid3rm4n spid3rm4n
item.description:
@spid3rm4n wrote:

if (command.startsWith("bomb") && playerRights >=1){ animation(437,absY,absX); attackPlayersWithin(50, 2); }

Read full topic
